page.title: 17A CHILD IN COOKSMILL GREEN
page.content: My sister and live too far away from our school to walk.We are taken by a {school bus.}We never know exactly when it will come.It can come at 8.30 or at 8.55.We wait at our gate and we can see Zita up the lane waiting with her mum.The coach comes with the hand- icapped children because it takes them to their special school as well.Last Winter in the snow it got stuck out- side our house.Our headmaster had to come and get us.There are no other boys of my age to play with near me.I wish my school friends were nearer.I go to cubs at Roxwell.At school my best game is Buzz.This is how we play it.A group of children get together and count up to 7.The one who is IT has to get someone off an obstacle.If the person calls "Buzz" you have to get off and run away.If you are caught you are IT and the game goes on.
